sense.name: (Cause to) convert into nitric acid, nitrous acid, or nitrate.
sense.examples: The compound nitrified. We nitrified the compound for the experiment.

sense.name: Treat with a nitrogen compound.
sense.commentary: Note: in contrast to the first sense, here the nitrogen compound already exists and is added to something else.
sense.examples: We should nitrify the soil for the crops. Farmers often nitrify the substrate.
